message: Guys, did anyone tried to install Orchard CMS on GoDaddy web hosting (windows)? Because I can't make it work!! I tried every possible way!!

data.message: Did you try the classic way? Installing locally (or downloading a ZIP file or some other sort of x-copy deployment thing if they offer that), uploading via FTP or whatever (and creating DB / running scripts if applicable), and seeing how it goes?
Also. ensure the folder/site has write permissions in there. Should be somewhere in your control panel

Yes, I adjust the permission to write to each folder, I installed it locally based on SqlCe and zipped the files and extracted it and still the silly error: The page cannot be displayed because an internal server error has occurred
Can you enable debugging and disable friendly errors to see the exact error?
I did and nothing!!!! really strange that's why i asked!!

I found this "Medium trust is not supported by Orchard. You will have to choose a different hosting company." in http://orchard.codeplex.com/discussions/440441 is this means that no way I can made work on Godaddy?
Get the specific error message first. I don't know if GoDaddy supports Full Trust hosting or no, could be the issues, just "maybe".
The point is I can't see any logs anywhere! Do you know from where I can see the logs in GoDaddy.com hosting?
Just modify webconfig to show the error in the browser

http://support.godaddy.com/help/article/2531/what-trust-level-can-i-use-when-running-aspnet
If this is true, you should have Full Trust if you use ASP.NET 4.0
Try adding the bit they suggest to your web.config

يااااه يا عبد الصمد :)
 تسلم يا محمد لما غيرت الـ trust level لـ Full اشتغل الحمد لله
dude no body host on Godaddy! they are the worst hosting service ever!
